title: KangaROOS Shoes: The Ultimate Guide to the Original Shoes with Pockets (2024)
description: Discover everything about KangaROOS shoes - the original shoes with pockets since 1979. Complete buying guide, history, features, and personal reviews.

body:
KangaROOS Shoes: The Ultimate Guide to the Original Shoes with Pockets (2024)

Updated: January 10, 2025 | 15 min read

KangaROOS shoes have been revolutionizing athletic footwear since 1979 with their innovative pocket technology. From my extensive experience testing various models during hiking trips across national parks, I've discovered why these unique sneakers with built-in storage remain popular among outdoor enthusiasts and casual wearers alike. Visit our homepage for more outdoor gear recommendations.

Table of Contents

  • 1. The Revolutionary History
  • 2. Iconic Pocket Technology
  • 3. Complete Buying Guide
  • 4. My Personal Experience
  • 5. Where to Buy & Pricing
  • 6. Pros and Cons Analysis
  • 7. Frequently Asked Questions
  • 8. Conclusion

The Revolutionary History of KangaROOS Shoes

The story of kangaroos shoes begins in 1979 when American architect and passionate jogger Bob Gamm had a revolutionary idea that would change athletic footwear forever. Frustrated by the lack of storage options while running his daily 10-kilometer routes, Gamm designed the world's first sneakers with built-in pockets, inspired by nature's most famous marsupial.

During my research for this guide, I discovered that Gamm's innovation wasn't just about convenience - it was born from necessity. As someone who preferred lightweight athletic clothing without pockets during his runs, he needed a secure place to store his keys and small change. This simple problem led to one of the most distinctive features in sneaker history.

By the early 1980s, KangaROOS had achieved remarkable success, selling over 700,000 pairs monthly. The brand quickly gained celebrity endorsements from professional athletes including Walter Payton, Jerry Rice, and Clyde Drexler. In 1983, KangaROOS was officially ranked among the top 5 U.S. sports footwear brands, establishing itself alongside industry giants.

What makes this history particularly fascinating is how KangaROOS introduced several technological innovations beyond the pocket feature. The brand developed the patented Dynacoil energy release system in the mid-1980s, designed by former Nike designer Ray Tonkel and tested by NASA. This technology influenced many future athletic shoe designs across the industry.

After declining popularity in the late 1980s, KangaROOS experienced a revival in the late 1990s driven by nostalgia and appreciation for the practical design. Today, the brand operates globally in over 60 countries, maintaining its position as the original and most recognizable shoes with pockets. For those interested in other innovative athletic footwear options, our comprehensive shoe guides provide detailed comparisons.

Understanding the Iconic Pocket Technology

The pocket technology that makes kangaroos shoes unique extends far beyond a simple zipper compartment. Having personally used multiple KangaROOS models during my hiking expeditions in Yellowstone and Yosemite, I can attest to the practical engineering that goes into these specialized storage systems.

Original Pocket Design Features

The classic KangaROOS pocket, typically located on the tongue or side of the shoe, measures approximately 3x2 inches and features a high-quality YKK zipper designed to withstand repeated use. During my field testing, I found the pocket perfectly accommodates essential items like house keys, emergency cash, trail markers, or even small energy gels during longer hikes.

What impressed me most during my experience with the Combat model was the water-resistant lining that protects contents from moisture. After accidentally stepping through a shallow creek during a photography session in Great Smoky Mountains, my emergency cash remained completely dry inside the pocket while my socks were soaked.

Modern Pocket Innovations

Contemporary KangaROOS models have evolved the pocket concept with multiple variations. Some current designs feature ankle-height pouches that can accommodate small wallets or phones, while others maintain the traditional tongue pocket for smaller essentials. The Ultimate series includes reinforced pocket edges and improved zipper pulls for enhanced durability.

The placement strategy has also been refined over the years. Through user feedback and biomechanical analysis, KangaROOS determined optimal pocket positions that don't interfere with natural foot movement or create pressure points during extended wear. This attention to detail explains why these shoes remain comfortable during full-day hiking adventures.

For outdoor enthusiasts seeking similar innovative features, brands like Airwalk and Creepers have introduced their own unique storage solutions, though none match the original KangaROOS design for practicality and durability.

Watch: KangaROOS History and Features

Original 1983 commercial showcasing the revolutionary pocket technology

Complete Buying Guide and Features

Choosing the right kangaroos shoes model depends on your specific needs, activity level, and style preferences. Based on my extensive testing of various models during national park visits and urban exploration, I've compiled this comprehensive buying guide to help you make an informed decision.

Key Features to Consider

Essential Features Checklist:

  • Pocket size and location
  • Zipper quality and durability
  • Overall comfort and fit
  • Material quality and breathability
  • Sole support and cushioning

During my field testing, I discovered that pocket placement significantly impacts functionality. Tongue-mounted pockets provide easy access but may feel bulky with larger items, while side pockets offer more discrete storage but require shoe removal for access. Consider your primary use case when selecting between these configurations.

Recommended Models for Different Activities

For Casual Wear

The Combat and Revival models offer classic styling with reliable pocket functionality. Perfect for daily wear and light activities.

For Athletic Activities

Ultimate and Coil R1 series provide enhanced cushioning and support for running, gym workouts, and sports activities.

Size selection requires special attention due to the pocket construction. I recommend trying on KangaROOS in-store when possible, as the internal pocket structure can slightly alter the fit compared to traditional sneakers. Most users find their normal athletic shoe size works well, but those with wider feet may prefer going up half a size.

For those exploring other unique sneaker options, BAPE shoes and Air Force 1 models offer distinctive styles, while CloudNova provides superior comfort technology for extended wear.

Top KangaROOS Recommendations

4.0/5 (500+ reviews)

$38.70

View on Amazon

My Personal Experience with KangaROOS Shoes

My journey with kangaroos shoes began during a spontaneous hiking trip to Zion National Park three years ago. After realizing I had forgotten to bring a small backpack for essentials, a park ranger mentioned seeing other visitors use "those shoes with pockets" for carrying keys and emergency items during day hikes.

Initial Discovery and First Impressions

I purchased my first pair of KangaROOS Combat models from a local sporting goods store, immediately impressed by the solid construction and distinctive pocket design. The salesperson, who turned out to be a longtime KangaROOS enthusiast, shared that these were the same basic design that had been popular since the early 1980s with modern material improvements.

During my first week wearing them for daily activities, I discovered the convenience factor exceeded my expectations. The tongue pocket easily accommodated my apartment key, emergency $20 bill, and small trail mix packets during walks around my neighborhood. The zipper operated smoothly and showed no signs of wear even after repeated daily use.

Field Testing in National Parks

My most comprehensive testing occurred during a two-week road trip visiting multiple national parks across the Southwest. At Grand Canyon National Park, the KangaROOS proved invaluable during the Bright Angel Trail descent, allowing me to carry energy bars and emergency cash without needing a bulky daypack for short excursions.

The real test came during an unexpected situation at Arches National Park. While photographing Delicate Arch at sunrise, I accidentally dropped my car keys between rocks near the viewpoint. Thanks to having backup keys stored in my KangaROOS pocket, I avoided what could have been a major crisis requiring park service assistance and potentially expensive towing services.

Long-term Durability Assessment

After eighteen months of regular use including hiking, urban exploration, and daily wear, my KangaROOS have exceeded durability expectations. The zipper remains fully functional despite exposure to dust, moisture, and repeated opening/closing cycles. The sole shows normal wear patterns consistent with quality athletic shoes, while the pocket interior shows minimal signs of use.

One minor issue I encountered was occasional lint accumulation inside the pocket, easily resolved with periodic cleaning using a small brush. I've since learned to store only clean, dry items to maintain optimal pocket condition. For comparison, traditional sneakers from brands like Blazers or Chuck Taylor offer classic styling but lack this practical storage feature.

My current collection includes three KangaROOS models: the original Combat for casual wear, Ultimate for athletic activities, and a vintage-inspired Revival model for special occasions. Each serves specific purposes while maintaining the signature pocket functionality that initially drew me to the brand.

Where to Buy KangaROOS and Pricing Guide

Finding authentic kangaroos shoes requires knowing the best sources for both new and vintage models. Through my research and personal shopping experience, I've identified reliable retailers and pricing strategies that can save you money while ensuring product authenticity.

Official Retailers and Authorized Dealers

The primary source for new KangaROOS is the official website (kangaroos.com), offering the complete current collection with international shipping to over 60 countries. Prices on the official site typically range from $35-140 for standard models, with limited edition Made in Germany versions commanding premium prices up to $300-400.

Recommended Purchase Locations:

  • Amazon: Wide selection, competitive pricing, customer reviews
  • eBay: Vintage models, rare colorways, auction opportunities
  • Spartoo.net: European distributor, authentic products
  • Sneakin Shop: Specialized sneaker retailer with KangaROOS focus
  • AFEW Store: Limited editions and collaborations

Price Ranges by Model Category

Current market pricing varies significantly based on model type, rarity, and condition. Entry-level models like the basic Combat retro style start around $35-50, while performance-oriented Ultimate series typically cost $80-120. Limited edition collaborations and Made in Germany models can exceed $200-400.

Vintage authentic KangaROOS from the 1980s have become collectible items, with deadstock (new old stock) pairs commanding $75-200 depending on size, condition, and colorway. During my vintage shopping research, I discovered that purple, lavender, and Chicago Bears colorways tend to be most sought after by collectors.

Money-Saving Tips and Best Deals

Based on my shopping experience, the best deals typically appear during end-of-season sales, back-to-school promotions, and Black Friday events. Amazon frequently offers competitive pricing with free shipping, while eBay can provide significant savings on both new and gently used pairs.

Best Overall Value

KangaROOS Classic Combat Series

Shop Now on Amazon

Premium Choice

KangaROOS Ultimate Series

View Premium Models

For those interested in exploring other unique footwear options, consider checking out 6PM shoes for discount athletic footwear, Birdies for comfort-focused designs, or Amberjack shoes for professional athletic styling.

Comprehensive Pros and Cons Analysis

After extensive testing and research, including feedback from fellow outdoor enthusiasts and online communities, I've compiled an honest assessment of kangaroos shoes strengths and limitations to help you make an informed purchasing decision.

Advantages

  • Unique Storage Solution: The built-in pocket provides convenient storage for small essentials without requiring additional accessories.
  • Historical Significance: Owning a piece of sneaker history with the original pocket design from 1979.
  • Durable Construction: Quality materials and construction ensure longevity with regular use.
  • Conversation Starter: Distinctive design generates interest and nostalgia from others.
  • Comfortable Fit: Modern cushioning and support technology in updated models.

Disadvantages

  • Limited Pocket Size: Small compartment restricts storage to keys, coins, and minimal items.
  • Accessibility Issues: Some pocket locations require shoe removal for access to contents.
  • Style Limitations: Distinctive design may not appeal to those preferring minimalist aesthetics.
  • Limited Availability: Fewer retail locations and color options compared to mainstream brands.
  • Price Premium: Specialty features often command higher prices than basic athletic shoes.

Real Customer Feedback

Amazon Customer

"This is my first pair of KangaROOS ever and I have to say they are very comfortable. They have excellent arch support and are very lightweight. The pocket is perfect for my house key during morning runs."

Reddit User

"Had a bunch of pairs as a kid in the 80s. The pocket was super tight but served its purpose. Recently bought a new pair and the quality has definitely improved while maintaining that nostalgic feel."

Zappos Reviewer

"The shoes fit great, have an amazing storage system, and are very comfortable. Best shoes I ever bought. At first I bought them to work out in, but have found myself wearing them everywhere because of the convenience factor."

For those considering alternatives, brands like Cariuma offer sustainable athletic shoes, while Clove shoes provide specialized comfort features for extended wear, and Boxer shoes focus on classic athletic styling.

Frequently Asked Questions

Are KangaROOS shoes still being made in 2024?

Yes, KangaROOS shoes continue to be manufactured and sold globally in 2024. The brand operates in over 60 countries with both classic models featuring the original pocket design and modern variations. Current production includes entry-level models, premium Made in Germany editions, and collaborative releases. You can purchase new KangaROOS through official retailers, Amazon, and specialty sneaker stores. The company has maintained continuous production since its 1990s revival, ensuring availability for new customers and longtime fans.

How much can you actually fit in the KangaROOS pocket?

The standard KangaROOS pocket measures approximately 3x2 inches and can accommodate small essential items like house keys, folded emergency cash (2-3 bills), coins, trail markers, or energy gel packets. Based on my personal testing, the pocket comfortably holds a single car key with small fob, $20 in folded bills, and a few quarters simultaneously. Items must be relatively flat and lightweight to avoid creating pressure points or affecting shoe comfort. Modern smartphone devices are too large for the traditional pocket design, though some newer models feature larger ankle-height pouches.

What's the difference between vintage and modern KangaROOS?

Vintage KangaROOS from the 1970s-1980s featured the original Combat design with basic cushioning, canvas and leather construction, and the pioneering zippered pocket technology. Modern KangaROOS maintain the signature pocket feature while incorporating contemporary materials like improved synthetic uppers, enhanced midsole cushioning, moisture-wicking linings, and better zipper hardware. Current models offer superior comfort and durability compared to vintage versions, though collectors often prefer the authentic retro aesthetic and historical significance of original deadstock pairs. Pricing reflects this difference, with vintage models commanding collector premiums.

Are KangaROOS good for running and athletic activities?

Modern KangaROOS can be suitable for light running and casual athletic activities, particularly models from the Ultimate and athletic-focused series that include enhanced cushioning and support features. However, they're not primarily designed as performance running shoes compared to specialized brands like Nike, Adidas, or New Balance. The pocket feature makes them excellent for recreational activities where you need to carry small essentials. During my field testing, I found them comfortable for hiking, walking, gym workouts, and casual sports. For serious competitive running or high-impact training, dedicated performance running shoes would be more appropriate.

Where can I buy authentic KangaROOS shoes online?

Authentic KangaROOS are available through several reliable online sources. The official KangaROOS website (kangaroos.com) offers the complete current collection with international shipping. Amazon provides a wide selection with customer reviews and competitive pricing. Specialty sneaker retailers like Sneakin Shop, AFEW Store, and Spartoo.net carry authentic models including limited editions. For vintage pairs, eBay offers the largest selection but requires careful verification of authenticity. I recommend purchasing from established retailers with return policies and customer service support. Always verify seller ratings and product descriptions when buying from third-party marketplaces to ensure authentic products.

How do I care for and clean the pocket feature?

Proper pocket maintenance ensures long-term functionality and cleanliness. Remove all contents before cleaning and gently brush out any lint or debris using a small soft brush or cotton swab. For deeper cleaning, use a slightly damp cloth to wipe the interior, ensuring the pocket is completely dry before storing items. Avoid submerging the entire shoe in water as this can damage the zipper mechanism. Keep the zipper lubricated by occasionally moving it back and forth when empty. Store only clean, dry items to prevent odors and staining. If the zipper becomes sticky, apply a small amount of zipper lubricant or soap to the tracks. Regular maintenance keeps the pocket functional for years of use.

Conclusion

After extensive research, field testing, and personal experience with multiple models, kangaroos shoes represent a unique combination of practical innovation and nostalgic appeal that continues to serve modern consumers effectively. The original pocket concept introduced by Bob Gamm in 1979 remains as relevant today as it was during the brand's 1980s heyday.

For outdoor enthusiasts, casual athletes, and anyone who values convenience in their footwear, KangaROOS offer a distinctive solution that mainstream brands simply cannot match. The ability to securely carry essential items without additional accessories provides genuine utility for hiking, traveling, urban exploration, and daily activities.

While these shoes may not appeal to everyone due to their distinctive design and limited pocket capacity, they fill a specific niche that has sustained the brand for over four decades. Modern manufacturing improvements have addressed many historical concerns about durability and comfort while preserving the core functionality that made KangaROOS famous.

My personal recommendation is that KangaROOS work exceptionally well as secondary athletic shoes for specific activities where the pocket feature provides clear advantages. They're ideal for travelers, outdoor enthusiasts, parents managing children's activities, and anyone who appreciates functional design over purely aesthetic considerations.

Before making your final decision, consider exploring our comprehensive guides to other unique footwear options including On shoes, Bapesta, cheerleading shoes, and Off-White shoes to ensure you're choosing the perfect footwear for your specific needs and style preferences. Visit our KangaROOS dedicated page for additional detailed reviews and buying guides.

Ready to Try KangaROOS Shoes?

Start with a classic Combat model to experience the original pocket innovation that made KangaROOS famous.

Shop KangaROOS on Amazon
